Title: Les bronzés font du ski
Writer: Josiane Balasko, Michel Blanc, Marie-Anne Chazel, Christian Clavier, Gérard Jugnot, Thierry Lhermitte, Bruno Moynot
Actors: Josiane Balasko, Michel Blanc, Marie-Anne Chazel, Christian Clavier
Plot: Eight tourists who met in a holiday camp on the Ivory Coast are reunited for a skiing holiday.
